name: network
summary: Export road network as graph for analysis
description:
The network command exports the OSM road network as a graph structure suitable for network analysis, routing algorithms, or visualization in graph tools.

The graph includes:
- Nodes at intersections and road endpoints
- Edges representing road segments
- Edge weights for distance and travel time
- Road attributes on edges

options.-f, --format: Output format: json, graphml, geojson, csv
options.--mode: Travel mode filter: drive, walk, bike, all
options.--include-speeds: Include speed estimates and travel times

output:
JSON: {nodes: [...], edges: [...]} structure
GraphML: Standard graph format for Gephi, NetworkX, etc.
GeoJSON: Edges as LineStrings with properties
CSV: Edge list with attributes
